guide.language: You can change the language to any of the available ones
guide.minVoltage: The minimum voltage at which the battery is considered discharged
guide.maxVoltage: The maximum voltage at which the battery is considered charged
guide.batteryCapacity: Battery capacity in ampere-hours. Usually indicated on the battery or in its passport.

guide.voltage: The value of the voltage on the battery. You can find out by measuring the voltage on the battery, or you can see it on the screen of the controller/inverter.
guide.wat: Power consumption. You can find out by looking at the controller/inverter screen, or calculate the approximate power of all connected devices.
